name: The Clicks
description:
Rules:

The game is played in several rounds, with two players. During the first round, yellow pawns are placed on the first row, and red on the last. 

The game continues until only one colour remains on the board, winning the round. Then the winner starts the next round, with that player's pawns one row further forward and his turn to play. When one of the players moves half of the bord the game is over.
